name: Don't get caught (itch) (Dodouce)
description:
Try to survive as long as possible without getting caught !

Command :

zqsd (azerty keyboard) or awsd (qwerty keyboard) to move.

Left click to shoot.

Rules : 

You can kill only the enemy of your color.

You can change your color be getting to the color areas when they are enabled.

Made by Snouz and Dodouce (https://www.instagram.com/dodoucee/) in 48h for the GeoJam2022. The theme was "Pick a side".
